talk.author: did:plc:krr5jbzl54tevysagbtcek4o
talk.utter: Its for legal precedent more than anything. It would be very hard to sue either way but declaring the collection of your content as misuse at least gives you a slight chance

talk.author: did:plc:lpjgbilh3pkhgmmrhr3ctzm6
talk.utter: Why would it be beneficial for someone for there to exist a precedent that their public posts can be excluded from being used to train LLMs?

talk.author: did:plc:krr5jbzl54tevysagbtcek4o
talk.utter: For a legal challenge? In case their data is proven to exist in a training set.

talk.author: did:plc:krr5jbzl54tevysagbtcek4o
talk.utter: For a legal challenge? In case their data is proven to exist in a training set.

talk.author: did:plc:lpjgbilh3pkhgmmrhr3ctzm6
talk.utter: What detriment am I incurring by having my posts in a training set?

talk.author: did:plc:krr5jbzl54tevysagbtcek4o
talk.utter: Are you really asking this? Are you a socialist AI bro? You realize that I dont want my data being used to train a product without compensation? If I was paid it'd be another thing, but I'm not. So I don't want to.
